The Honourable Mr Justice R. SURESH KUMAR
The Honourable Mr Justice C. SARAVANAN

TO BE HEARD THROUGH VIDEO CONFERENCING / HYBRID MODE / PHYSICAL MODE ON THURSDAY THE 30TH DAY OF JANUARY 2025 AT 10.30 A.M.(Regular List) - 6. COURT LINK ALSO AVAILABLE IN https://www.mhc.tn.gov.in/vclink CASES WILL BE TAKEN UP AS FOLLOWS: (ADMISSION and MPS - ON ALL DAYS) MONDAY,TUESDAY and WEDNESDAY - WRIT APPEAL - SERVICE and WP - JUDICIAL SERVICE THURSDAY and FRIDAY – TAX CASES ARISING FROM INDIRECT TAX LAWS (INCLUDING CUSTOMS, CENTRAL EXCISE, GST, SALES TAX ETC., (A) CASES ALREADY ADJOURNED BY MENTIONING SHOULD NOT BE MENTIONED FOR BEING ADJOURNED ONCE AGAIN. (B) IN ANY EVENT, NO MENTIONING WILL BE PERMITTED WITHOUT THE PRESENCE OF THE OPPOSITE SIDE COUNSEL. (C) NO ADJOURNMENT WILL BE ENTERTAINED BY MENTIONING AT THE TIME OF RESUMPTION OF COURT IN RESPECT OF 'AFTER NOTICE CASES' AND 'FINAL HEARING CASES'
